scripts.dev: yarn && npm-run-all common:build -p data:build api:build -p web:dev data:dev api:dev common:build:watch data:build:watch api:build:watch
scripts.lint:check: concurrently "cd api && yarn lint:check" "cd common && yarn lint:check" "cd data && yarn lint:check" "cd web && yarn lint:check"
scripts.lint:fix: concurrently "cd api && yarn lint:fix" "cd common && yarn lint:fix" "cd data && yarn lint:fix" "cd web && yarn lint:fix"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd api && yarn test" "cd common && yarn test" "cd data && yarn test" "cd web && yarn test"
scripts.test:cov: concurrently "cd api && yarn test:cov" "cd common && yarn test:cov" "cd data && yarn test:cov" "cd web && yarn test:cov"
scripts.postinstall: (husky install && husky set .husky/pre-commit "cd api && yarn lint-staged && cd ../common && yarn lint-staged && cd ../data && yarn lint-staged && cd ../web && yarn lint-staged") || exit 0
